short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: adds a ripple to your clicks so they can be recorded for demo purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: when you record a video, it is not clear that you have clicked an item on the page. This extension will add a ripple to your mouse clicks.
